Package server

Interface GameClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client
public interface GameClient

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkUsername(String username)
    Sends the username to the server, if the username is not taken in the server, it returns true, if it is taken this method returns false.
    void
    close()
    closes the connection with the server.
    boolean
    connect(InetAddress address, int port)
    connect tries to set up a connection with the provided parameters, if a connection is set up, it returns true, otherwise it returns false.
    void
    getHelp()
    getHelp prints the list with basic commands.
    String
    getList()
    asks the server to send us a list of all the current players on that server.
    String
    getModeStatus()
    this looks at the mode of a player and according to that value this method returns the fitting description of that value.
    String
    getStatus()
    returns the status of the player according several variables.
    void
    isPlaying()
    checks if the player is playing a game, stops when the player finishes the game.
    void
    ping()
    sends ping message to the server, it expects a pong message back from the server.
    void
    pong()
    sends a pong message to the server, as a reaction to a received ping message.
    String
    queue(String data)
    asks the server to put us in a queue to play a game, if this is triggered while the player already is in a queue, he or she will then be removed from the queue.
    void
    sendData(String data)
    send data takes a String and sends it to the socket of the server it's connected to.
    void
    sendMove(int index, int toRotate)
    this method is a special sendMessage method that sends this player's move to the server, and waits on.
    void
    startInitialization()
    send the HELLO command to the server and also checks if the server sends a hello message back.
    void
    waitResponse()
    this method keeps on running until the server receives a message.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      boolean connect(InetAddress address, int port)
      connect tries to set up a connection with the provided parameters, if a connection is set up, it returns true, otherwise it returns false.
      Parameters:
      address - the server address the player wants to connect with
      port - the port number where the player wants to connect with
      Returns:
      true if the connection succeeded or false if it failed

    • close

      void close()
      closes the connection with the server.

    • sendMove

      void sendMove(int index, int toRotate) throws IOException
      this method is a special sendMessage method that sends this player's move to the server, and waits on.
      Parameters:
      index - the index number of a field this player want to put a mrable on.
      toRotate - the value for what quadrant the player want to rotate
      Throws:
      IOException - if something went wrong in the sendData method, this throws an error to the place this method is called, so it can be caught in a personalised way.

    • sendData

      void sendData(String data) throws IOException
      send data takes a String and sends it to the socket of the server it's connected to.
      Parameters:
      data - is the message that will be sent to the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong with sending the message, other methods that use sendData can catch it, so they can send a personalised error message.

    • startInitialization

      void startInitialization()
      send the HELLO command to the server and also checks if the server sends a hello message back.

    • waitResponse

      void waitResponse()
      this method keeps on running until the server receives a message.

    • isPlaying

      void isPlaying()
      checks if the player is playing a game, stops when the player finishes the game.

    • checkUsername

      boolean checkUsername(String username)
      Sends the username to the server, if the username is not taken in the server, it returns true, if it is taken this method returns false.
      Parameters:
      username - is the name of the player
      Returns:
      true if name is not already in server, false if it is.

    • getList

      String getList()
      asks the server to send us a list of all the current players on that server.
      Returns:
      all players needly displayed in a list

    • queue

      String queue(String data)
      asks the server to put us in a queue to play a game, if this is triggered while the player already is in a queue, he or she will then be removed from the queue.
      Returns:
      a message saying if the player joined or left the queue

    • getStatus

      String getStatus()
      returns the status of the player according several variables. so it can be printed by the client
      Returns:
      the status of the player concerning its name, queu status, mode status and gamestatus

    • getModeStatus

      String getModeStatus()
      this looks at the mode of a player and according to that value this method returns the fitting description of that value.
      Returns:
      the description of the mode this player is in.

    • getHelp

      void getHelp()
      getHelp prints the list with basic commands.

    • ping

      void ping()
      sends ping message to the server, it expects a pong message back from the server.

    • pong

      void pong()
      sends a pong message to the server, as a reaction to a received ping message.
